name: Funding Asia Group Pte Ltd
description: Developer of a peer-to-peer lending platform designed to specialize in short-term financing for small and medium enterprises. The company's platform provides fast and flexible financing options including microloans, term loans and invoice financing, enabling clients to capitalize on businesses that often struggle to secure loans from banks and traditional providers.
one_liner: Developer of a peer-to-peer lending platform designed to specialize in short-term financing for small and medium enterprises. The company's platform provides fast and flexible financing options including microloans, term loans and invoice financing, enabling clients to capitalize on businesses that often struggle to secure loans from banks and traditional providers.
